title: Mac on 7.14 Ping Doubled
body:
I recently did the 7.14 patch and ever since (apart from having insane issues downloading it) ive have 182 ping instead of my standard 82. I've tried to reinstall league, restart my router/ modem, run the repair tool, run on low spec mode, and pretty much everything else. 

Any assistance would be appreciated. I have the LoL Logs if necessary.

replies.body: Likely a coincidental network issue. Can you run a ping to 104.160.131.1 then a tracert to the same address and post the results?
You see where it jumps from 11 to 127 at qwest? You need to call qwest and give their support this trace route. Then you pray they actually do something about it.

More than likely this is some kind of weird coincidence, but since this happened just after the patch let's make sure that your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) are all still configured the best way for League to run properly.
